item.title: Month arithmetic in R, a quick guide
item.description: Here are questions you might want to ask about months: How many more months until September 1? months_to How many more calendar months until September 1? cal_months_to How many months between this month and September 1? months_between How many more calendar months between this month and September 1? cal_months_between In how many calendar months must I wait until September 1? months_inclusive Assume we are asking the question on February 1 of a non-leap year.
